short_summary: CMHC is in need of [an integrated end-to-end Data & Analytics Operating Model]
description: Request for proposals for delivering a data and analytics operating model. This RFP is calling for an agreement on a non-exclusive basis with a successful proponent for a period of 8 months with an option to extend. The CMHC will not distribute solicitation documents posted on buyandsell.gc.ca. Suppliers must download the solicitation document and attachments directly.
full_summary:
# Request for Proposal (RFP) for Data and Analytics Operating Model
---

## Tender Information

* Reference Number: PW-22-01005453
* Solicitation Number: 001537
* Amendment Number: 3
* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-05T14:00:00 (EDT)
* Publication Date: 2022-08-26

## Background

The Canada Mortgage and Housing Corporation (CMHC) is seeking proposals from qualified proponents to deliver an integrated end-to-end Data and Analytics Operating Model (DAOM). This project aims to establish a comprehensive data and analytics framework, enabling CMHC to effectively engage in decision-making and policy development.

## Project Objectives

The successful proponent will work with CMHC to:

1. Develop a robust data governance framework.
2. Design an effective analytics strategy and architecture.
3. Implement and maintain a data management system.
4. Provide training and support for CMHC staff.

## Terms and Conditions

* The agreement will be awarded on a non-exclusive basis for an initial period of 8 months.
* The contract may be extended for the same term and conditions.
* Bidders must submit their proposals directly through the tender page, as CMHC will not distribute solicitation documents.

## Solicitation Documents

* [View Solicitation Document (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/26/2b098799ae0ba1895f4582ee14abf496/cmhc_rfp-001537_for_data_and_analytics_operating_model.pdf)
* [View Addendum 1 (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/12/d4e3ff330b2f40e39f032bdf7c1bfcb9/addendum_1_-_rfp001537-_data_and_analytics_operating_model.pdf)
* [View Addendum 2 (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/09/19/f4c3fec25d8c36a95b68ce103fe5d96f/addendum_2_-_rfp-001537_for_data_and_analytics_operating_model.pdf)
* [View Addendum 3 (PDF)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/04/241af393
